naslov: GORNJI GRAD: BAROKNA PRIZEMNICA 787 m2, s velikim vrtom *BEZ PROVIZIJE (prodaja)
Lokacija: Grad Zagreb, Gornji Grad - Medveščak, Gornji grad
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: KUPAC NE PLAĆA AGENCIJSKU PROVIZIJU * Prodaje se kasnobarokna prizemnica orijentirana istok-zapad, s dvostrešnim krovom i suterenom u punoj visini etaže, iz kojeg se izlazi u veliki kaskadni vrt, koja je nakon zagrebačkog potresa 2020. godine dobila zelenu naljepnicu. Kuća ima ukupnu stambenu površinu od 787 m2, visina stropa u suterenu i prizemlju je od 3,50 do 4,15 m, dok je roh-bau potkrovlje dimenzija 27,50 m x 10 m, s visinom sljemena krova 6 m. Prizemlje kuće sastoji se od 7 soba --- velikog salona, 2 dnevna boravka, 2 radne sobe i 2 spavaće sobe, te od 2 kuhinje, po 1 kupaonice sa i bez wc-a, zasebnog wc-a, sušionice rublja, zimskog vrta i 2 terase sa prekrasnim panoramskim pogledom na istok. Suteren kuće sastoji se od 9 soba --- 2 dnevna boravka, 3 radne sobe i 4 spavaće sobe, te od 2 kuhinje, 1 kupaonice sa i 2 bez wc-a, 2 zasebna wc-a, kotlovnice, 6 spremišta i zimskog vrta, iz kojeg se izlazi u kaskadni troetažni vanjski vrt. Etažno plinsko centralno grijanje. Kuća zahtijeva potpunu adaptaciju, no zbog svoje iznimne lokacije u povijesnoj jezgri Zagreba idealna je prilika za preuređenje u veći broj reprezentativnih apartmana i/ili poslovnih prostora ili u muzejski prostor, s mogućnošću organiziranja u kući i vrtu evenata poput domjenaka, proslava rođendana, vjenčanja i krstitki, svečanih večera te manjih koncerata. Vlasništvo kuće je uredno i bez tereta, te kuća ima uporabnu dozvolu pa se može kupiti i na kredit. Cijena nije fiksna. Za sve dodatne informacije i razgledavanje kuće kontaktirajte nas na: Vedran Vidmar, dipl.iur. Agent s licencom Mob.: +385 95 5923 509 W NEKRETNINE E-mail: w.nekretnine@gmail.com ZAGREB - UPPER TOWN: A BAROQUE ONE-STORY HOUSE with an area od 787 sqm and a large garden * NO COMMISSION THE BUYER DOESN'T PAY THE AGENCY COMMISSION * A late-baroque, east-west oriented one-story house from 1785, with a gable roof and a full-height basement from which you can access a large cascading garden, which received a green sticker after the 2020 Zagreb earthquake, is for sale. The house has a living area of 787 square meters, the ceiling height in the basement and ground floor is from 3.50 to 4.15 m, while the roh-bau attic is 27.50 m x 10 m, with a roof ridge height of 6 m. The ground floor of the house consists of 7 rooms --- a grand salon, 2 living rooms, 2 study rooms and 2 bedrooms, and of 2 kitchens, 1 bathroom each with and without toilet, separate toilet, laundry room, winter garden and 2 terraces with a beautiful panoramic view to the east. The basement of the house consists of 9 rooms --- 2 living rooms, 3 study rooms and 4 bedrooms, and of 2 kitchens, 1 bathroom with and 2 without a toilet, 2 separate toilets, a boiler room and a winter garden, which exits into a cascading three-level outdoor garden. Floor gas central heating. The house requires complete renovation, but due to its exceptional location in the historic centre of Zagreb, it is an ideal opportunity for transformation into a large number of representative apartments and/or business premises or a museum, with the possibility of organising events in the house and garden, such as receptions, birthday celebrations, weddings, christenings, gala dinners and smaller concerts. The ownership of the house is orderly and free of encumbrances, and the house has been issued with an occupancy permit, so it can be bought with a loan. The price is not fixed. For all additional information and viewing of the house, please contact us at: Vedran Vidmar, LLB Licensed agent Mob.: +385 95 5923 509 W NEKRETNINE E-mail: w.nekretnine@gmail.com
